basics.name: Richard Huang
basics.label: Software Engineer || JavaScript, React, Redux, Ruby, Ruby on Rails, HTML, CSS, SQL, Node.js, MongoDB
basics.summary:
I'm a software engineer with desire to build projects with a lasting impact. I'm passion for React, Redux, Rails and CSS. My main project right now is a online chat room platform that use Rails as backend and React as front end. On the side I'm building a Vanilla JavaScript web puzzle game.

As a personal note, I was a major in Statistic and  I enjoy manipulating number. I used to work at Cruise Automation as test operator, which made me more into modern technology. I consider myself as a dynamic communicator and problem-solving team player excels under pressure and on teams driven by productivity and accountability.

Additional skills: Ruby- JS - SQL - HTML - CSS - Webpack - React
